titles.title: A resolution designating each of February 7, 2007, and February 6, 2008, as "National Women and Girls in Sports Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/7/2007--Introduced.
Designates February 7, 2007, and February 6, 2008, as National Women and Girls in Sports Day.
